entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas late in the morning and in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 5 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 19 February 2023
